body.name: SECRUI Wireless Doorbell, Easy installation, Waterproof, Adjustable Volume, 58 Chimes, Colorful LED, 1000Ft Range, M520+F55, White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 39 mins
features: [Easy Installation] Just plug the mini doorbell receiver in the socket and place the button on the wall, either with double sided tape or screws, for the hassle free installation experience.
[Long Range] The high frequency electronic technology remote control doorbell is capable of reaching up to 1000 feet, with the help of FM signal scheme.

[Different Chimes] The battery powered doorbell is equipped with 58 different chime options with 5 volume levels, so that you do have to find the sound annoying every time when the neighbor, mailman or a guest rings the bell.
[All Weather Resistance] The bell is made up of high quality waterproof material, for that high performance experience during wind, snow, sleet or extreme hot, cold temperatures.
[Compatibility] The wireless doorbell is designed to suit all types of home aesthetically and it is also suitable for classroom, office, store and many more.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Key Features 1,000 Ft/300M of Long Operating Range This high-frequency electronic technology wireless doorbell adopts the FM signal scheme, which has strong anti-interference features and one-to-one signal pairing. Enough coverage for your entire house, ensure that you're never to miss a visitor! Ultra Long Battery Life Ultra-low power consumption, the receiver adopts an optimized circuit design. The push button transmitter uses a CR2032 lithium battery which has an ultra-long lifespan of up to 3 years(Low usage). IP55 Weather/Dustproof IP55 dustproof and waterproof protection. The doorbell push button will be functional between -4 °F to 140 °F, to withstand the harshest weather conditions like rainstorms, direct sun exposure, snow, and frost.

58 Premium Chimes & 5 Volumes The plug-in receiver offers rich and premium sound which is up to 58, comes with holiday themed chimes; 5 adjustable volume levels(with mute) with a maximum volume of 120 dB. Choose the ringtones you prefer and greet your guest at any time! Remember Your Settings Retains chime configurations if unplugged and even during power outages. Use friendly, no need to confiture doorbell settings again if unplugged. Make your life safe and simple! Visual LED indicator The bell push button will flash blue light when it was pressed, while the signal is received by the plug-in receiver, the receiver will flash 7 colors LED light indicator and make a pleasant sound.

Q & A Q1: I would like to have one doorbell ring differently from the other. This way I know which door to go to. Is this possible and how do I set it? Actually, you can use the note button to cycle through tones and hold the note button for 5 sec to cycle in reverse, then press the note key to choose the tone you want. Here are the steps for your reference: a. Select a tone that you like.b. Pressing and holding the MUSIC & VOLUME button for about 5s until the receiver beeps once, which means the receiver gets into pairing mode.c. Press the push button once, the receiver will beep twice with LED indicator flashes 1s.d. Press the push button once again, the receiver will beep once with LED indicator flashes 1s.e. Short press VOLUME button, the pairing is successful. When you press the push button, it will play the tone you choose. Q2: What 58 different chimes? How about a list before I buy? Yes, this doorbell has 58 tones, here is the chime list: 1. Dingdong-1 2. Dingdong-2 3. Dingdong-3 4. Scale 135i 5. Scale i531 6. Dingdong-4 7. Dingdong-5 8. Dingdong-6 9. Dingdong-7 10. Dingdong-8 11. Bell-1 12. Bell-2 13. Bell-3 14. Bell-4 15. Dingdong-9 16. Dingdong-10 17. Take me out to the ball game 18. A Comme amour 19. Susanna 20. Symphony No.40 in minor 21. Serenade for strings in G major 22. Love story 23. Doraemon 24. Ten Little Indians 25. Nutcracker two 26. Fast Ding Dong Ding Dong 27. Violin Concerto - spring 28. Four little swans 29. Serenade 30. Minuet 31. To Alice 32. Auld Lang Syne 33. Carman Overture 34. Bach Minuet 35. Turkey March 36. Music 01 37. Nokia classic ringtones 38. Radetzky March 39. Scale 1351 1531 40. Ringing tone 41. Romeo and Juliet 42. Kung Fu episode 43. Violin Concerto No.1 44. Drinking song - Camellia girl 45. Kiss the rain 46. Irish thrush 47. Lake Baikal 48. Cannon 49.Romance in the Rain 50. Titanic 51. Scale 5351 52. Romance of love 53. Tetris 54. Yesenia 55. Mermaid 56. Merry Christmas 57. Scarborough fair 58. Music box of love

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars INEXPENSIVE; WORKS GREAT; EASY TO INSTALL
reviews.reviewText: We installed the doorbell button on the door frame of our covered side porch about 3 months ago using the double sided tape and it sticks very securely even in the hot afternoon sun. I plugged the chime part of the doorbell into an outlet in the center of our large single story house and we can hear the doorbell from anywhere in the house. Some people might like a louder doorbell but it suits us just fine.There are lots of options to choose from, it's easy to scroll through to choose an option or to change it any time & the volume is adjustable as well. BOTTOM LINE: The price was great, it was very easy to install, it works quite well, we're very pleased with this purchase & would recommend it to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to install and works great!
reviews.reviewText: I can't believe how easy this was to "install" and use! You just stick the doorbell to the outside of your house (preferably in a protected area), and then plug in the base inside your house. You can change the volume to very low to really high, both parts are small, and the only thing you have to do is put the battery in the base--no electrical work or mechanical work. So much cheaper than the other doorbells on the market, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, good price, works fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Replaced My old Doorbell.
reviews.reviewText: I just replaced my old doorbell system whichrequired (3) batteries...The New Door Bell System I ordered was a plug in and very easy to install and has various ring tones. You can adjust the volume as well. Great buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have a hardwired doorbell that stopped working. I did not want to spend a lot of money on having an electrician come out and fix the doorbell. I looked up various options, and this one had great reviews. It is incredibly easy, I just glued the new doorbell Button onto the place where my old doorbell existed, and plugged the chime into an outlet inside the house. It works like a dream. Easy, and very inexpensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: The doorbell was very easy to work and install. A lot of choices for the ring tone. Seems to be working great. I like also that the volume can be adjusted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product, very useful for my shop!
reviews.reviewText: Good product, easy to install, works well!
